name: Clockwork Clara
description:
Clockwork Clara was designed thinking of one question: What kind of problem solver are you?

There are four puzzles, all inspired by different mind sets: Pensive, Leisure, Chaos and Tactics. They all relate to the same rules but some are for more instinctive players, and other for more rational gamers, because we all approach problems our own way. 

HOW TO PLAY
Swipe up, left, right or down to combine as many tiles as possible. The longer he combination, the better.

WHERE DOES IT COME FROM?
Clockwork Clara was inspired by Mean Bean Machine, 2048 and Dots. It is the quick play version of Sara And Death: https://roccosalvetti.itch.io/sara-and-death

SPECIAL THANKS TO...
A very special thanks to Sole Varichio for the graphics (work in progress), Klara Murnau for modelling and Bzur for the musics.
